alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 5:20PM EST until February 05 at 8:13AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Monongahela River Near Charleroi affecting Washington, Fayette and Westmoreland Counties. Monongahela River Near Elizabeth affecting Allegheny, Washington and Westmoreland Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAC003-125-129-051315- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.W.0004.220204T2300Z-220205T1313Z/ /ELZP1.1.ER.220205T0300Z.220205T0600Z.220205T0712Z.NO/ 520 PM EST Fri Feb 4 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Monongahela River near Elizabeth. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Small communities around Lock 3 area begin minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 20.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
